title: At the Doctors Today, I was given a vaccine survey and....
cleaned_text:
Re: At the Doctors Today, I was given a vaccine survey and.............. They are still flapping above us like momentarily chastised vampire bats.

 



I'm sure there is another pandemic in the works. Biden has alluded to that.



But with the 1st battle won, the Feds, pharmaceutical and MSM have lost credibility on health issues with 60-80% of Americans. 



The next attempt is likely to fall flat on it's face. I'm sure there is another pandemic in the works. Biden has alluded to that.But with the 1st battle won, the Feds, pharmaceutical and MSM have lost credibility on health issues with 60-80% of Americans.The next attempt is likely to fall flat on it's face.

Re: At the Doctors Today, I was given a vaccine survey and.............. Omg





I was at a new doctors today 



SAME THING HAPPENED 



EXACTLY 



I said no 



He spent 20 minutes (no shit) debating it 



I countered him well



He said COVid vaccines “totally 100%” safe



I shook my head 



I said “I believe in our god given immune system”



He said “nature enabled us to create vaccines so 

how do you counter that?”



I laughed and replied “nature also enabled to create the Atomic Bomb- 

so by your logic- the atomic bomb is a positive thing?”



Then I thanked him and left 



I hate western doctors more and more 



//

Re: At the Doctors Today, I was given a vaccine survey and.............. unfortunately the next pandemic they release may be real and nobody will trust them for their vaccines. A lot of people may die, even more than now

 



I'm willing to take that chance over any of their damned vaccines. They lost ALL their credibility with me.

 I'm willing to take that chance over any of their damned vaccines. They lost ALL their credibility with me. 



When you know people that had severe adverse effects or died from the vax, people won't forget.

Re: At the Doctors Today, I was given a vaccine survey and.............. I stay away from doctors. But if I get one of those nosy questionnaires they get the thing back blank.

 



I wrote NOPE across the front page and gave it back.



The nurse snickered.

 J 17:15: "I pray not that Thou shouldst take them out of the world, but that Thou shouldst keep them from the evil. vs20: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word."



"Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth." I wrote NOPE across the front page and gave it back.The nurse snickered.

The doctor lies. No one can say a medicine or vaccine is 100% safe. There are always side effects. We can’t even eat the same foods. Some people are allergic and some foods can kill them.
